text: Serge Panine is an 1880 novel by the French writer Georges Ohnet.Goble p.351 ==Adaptations== It has been adapted into films on four occasions: * Serge Panine (1913 film), a French silent film * Serge Panine (1915 film), an American silent film *A Life for a Life (1916), a Russian film * Serge Panine (1922 film), an Austrian-French silent film * Serge Panine (1939 film), a French film ==References== ==Bibliography== Category:1890 French novels Category:Novels by Georges Ohnet Category:French novels adapted into films
title: Serge Panine (novel)
